text:
Sorry for the noise, it was my fault. I had enable-uploads to false. We should
add a check for this to the OneForm editor usecase preconditions.

I checked tinymce and one form editor on osx and windows in proxied and non-proxied environments. Umlauts work fine, image and internal link insertion too, saving is possible without complaints.

The only thing broken I noticed are the + and - images in the sitetree widget on the insert link dialogue in internet explorer 7 in a proxied environment using jörn's scaffold. I consider this a minor problem.
